name: MightyVersus
description:
This is a downgraded 64 by 64 resolution version of the newly released party fighter multiversus made for the lowRez Jam 2022. This downgrade has currently 4 playable characters with possibly more played (only 2 player but give a bit of time it should be capable of 4 people). This was written in JavaScript and so if there's any performance issues please message me because the code is kind of a mess and I'm not to sure if it runs on basic any device.

controls :
holding different directions and attacking after or before Jumping provides different attacks and moves

player1 : W (Jump) : ASD (movement/Attack Direction) : Space (Attack) 

player2 : I (Jump) : JKL (movement/Attack Direction) : Enter (Attack)
